Package rlee348.sounds

Class JavaSoundAudioDevice

java.lang.Object
javazoom.jl.player.AudioDeviceBase
rlee348.sounds.JavaSoundAudioDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
javazoom.jl.player.AudioDevice
public class JavaSoundAudioDevice
extends javazoom.jl.player.AudioDeviceBase
The JavaSoundAudioDevice implements an audio device by using the JavaSound API. Allows you to change volume.
Since:
0.0.8
Author:
Mat McGowan, Modified by Ryan Lee
